pullrequest.title: Update the style of collapsible items

content.raw:
I'm still working out a plan, and will come up with a design soon. I'm general nesting widgets leads to a confusing user experience, and is not scalable. I believe most UI do not needed a hierarchy, rather they support navigation through the hierarchy.

A collapsible widget is still useful, in the list context. Material design calls this expanding panels, or something similar.
content.html:
I'm still working out a plan, and will come up with a design soon. I'm general nesting widgets leads to a confusing user experience, and is not scalable. I believe most UI do not needed a hierarchy, rather they support navigation through the hierarchy.

A collapsible widget is still useful, in the list context. Material design calls this expanding panels, or something similar.
